title: Find 6 Differences – Spot the Hidden Changes!
description: Put your observation skills to the test in Find 6 Differences, a fun and relaxing puzzle game! With 20 unique levels, each featuring two nearly identical images, your goal is simple: find the 6 differences before time runs out! 20 challenging levels with beautifully designed images and engaging gameplay that sharpens your attention to detail. Hint system to help you when you're stuck.
instructions: Tap on the game screen to play this game.

title: Monster Slayer Merge & Survive
description: Welcome to our thrilling adventure game! Your journey consists of two main parts: merging items and exploring dungeons. Embark on this epic journey, combine powerful items, and conquer the depths of the dungeon!
instructions: In the upper part of the screen, your character moves through the dungeon level by level. Use the items you've merged to overcome challenges and defeat enemies as you delve deeper into the dungeon.

title: Puzzle Blocks Classic
description: Get ready for an addictive block puzzle challenge! Drag and drop colorful blocks to clear lines and rack up points. Think ahead, make big matches, and unleash powerful Super Blocks to crush multiple lines at once! Stuck? Use boosters to keep the game going. With three chances to clear the center, aim for the highest score and climb the global leaderboard. Easy to play, hard to master—can you become the ultimate puzzle champion? Let the block-dropping fun begin!
instructions: Drag and drop colourful blocks onto the board to fill rows or columns. Complete lines to clear them and score points. Bigger clears give bigger rewards! Use boosters when you're stuck to keep the game flowing. Charge your energy meter to unlock Super Blocks, which clear multiple lines at once. You have three chances to clear the center for extra points. Plan your moves carefully, compete globally for the highest score, and unlock exciting titles as you progress!

title: Bus Parking Out
description: Logic meets strategy! Operate 3 types of buses in 8 vibrant colors, each requiring careful planning. Enjoy a stunning 3D environment, as you clear the way for the selected bus and collect passengers. Master the art of optimal movement.
instructions: Players move different colored buses placed in a parking lot, each with its own size and movement direction. The goal of the game is to clear paths to free the selected bus and collect matching passengers in the most efficient way possible.

title: Money ping pong
description: Money ping pong is a casual idle game where you need to deftly install money blocks, use them to reduce the space for balls and earn money faster and more money! There are many different maps and dozens of functional blocks Relaxing gameplay
instructions: Place money blocks on the field to create your own pinball strategy for making money. Buy upgrades to complete the level.

title: Pin Puzzle Love Story
description: Are you ready to use your logical mind to save love? In Pin Puzzle-Love Story, you face a series of interesting and challenging levels. Pull pins in the right order to solve puzzles and help couples reunite. Each level is a new Logic puzzle that can only be successfully completed by pulling the right latch!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: The Hardest Puzzle Ever
description: An Exciting Puzzle Game for the Whole Family! ? Play together and train your brain every day! ?? Enjoy thrilling puzzles suitable even for the youngest players. With new levels added daily, there's always a fresh challenge waiting for you! Have fun, improve your skills, and become a true puzzle master! ??
instructions: In this game, your goal is to assemble a bright picture by moving pieces across the board. Simply drag and drop the pieces into the correct spots until the image is complete. Be careful, as some pieces may look similar, but only one spot is right for each. Once all the pieces are in place, you’ll see the beautiful picture come together! Enjoy the process and sharpen your attention!

title: Unblock Ball Slide Puzzle
description: Welcome to Unblock Ball: Slide Puzzle, a classic sliding puzzle game that lets you use your mind.You can feel a sense of accomplishment! Sliding the board to create the channel for the ball to roll smoothly to the end. You should use your logical mind to cleverly move blocks, avoid obstacles, and solve every puzzle!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: sokoban puzzle game
description: Push the Box game is an addictive and challenging puzzle game. It will help you train your brain. The operation of the game is very simple, move the box pusher by using the four direction buttons: up, down, left and right, push all the boxes to the specified position, the game is considered successful. If you are a fan of matching puzzle games, you will love our game. Keep your brain sharp while relaxing, having fun and relieving stress. Come and enjoy playing this puzzle game!
instructions: Move the box pusher by using the four direction buttons up, down, left and right in the game interface.

title: Baling Bum
description: Baling Bum – A Creative Rainbow Puzzle! ?☀️ Get ready for a unique and challenging puzzle game! In Baling Bum, your mission is to move or rotate the rainbow blocks to return the sun to the clouds. As you progress, the puzzles become trickier, requiring logical thinking and strategic moves! Are you ready to bring the sun back to the sky? ☁️✨ Play Baling Bum now and put your puzzle-solving skills to the test!
instructions: Move or rotate the rainbow blocks to return the sun to the clouds

title: Unlock the Bolts
description: Unlock the Bolts is a challenging puzzle game where you carefully remove screws to solve mechanical puzzles. Each level tests your logic and precision as you figure out the correct order to unlock the bolts. In special levels, the stakes are even higher—you must free trapped animals by unlocking the right bolts! With satisfying mechanics and engaging challenges, this game will keep you thinking and entertained. Can you master every puzzle and rescue the animals in need?
instructions: Follow the game instructions!

title: Load The Dishes ASMR
description: Load The Dishes ASMR is a puzzle game that puts you in comfort and fun! Your task is to sort different colored dishes and put them in the dishwasher. By organizing your cutlery in an organized way, you will find that this is not just a simple puzzle challenge, but also a super relaxing ASMR sound experience.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Shop Sorting 2
description: Love organizing and keeping things tidy? Then Shop Sorting 2 is the perfect game for you! Step into a satisfying sorting puzzle where you arrange and categorize products in a well-stocked store. In Shop Sorting 2, the challenge shifts from organizing specialty goods to managing the variety and chaos of a busy supermarket. Test your skills as you handle groceries, household items, and more. Enjoy rewarding match and sort gameplay, unlock new products, and upgrade your store layout.
instructions: Drag and place products onto the shelves. Match three identical items to clear them. Organize all the products to complete each level. As you progress, unlock new store layouts and take on even bigger sorting challenges in the supermarket.

title: Emoji Merge Fun Moji
description: Welcome to Emoji Merge: Fun Moji! A fun and creative jigsaw puzzle that allows you to merge various funny emojis. Create super funny, super cute emoji combinations. It's not just a simple merger game and full of interesting challenges.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Traffic Parking
description: Traffic Parking is a car puzzle game to park the car into the garage of the house, the car is on the road looking for a way to go home by avoiding other cars. Sometimes there are rocks on the road that must be removed so that the car can pass through. You also need tricks at certain levels to make the road passable for cars.
instructions: Touch the car to see the car’s path, touch again to drive the car.

title: TapTapBOOM
description: Blast your way through 30 challenging levels in this cute and explosive physics game, where all you need is to TapTapBOOM!
instructions: Solve the physics puzzles by placing bombs. Tap 2 times to place your bombs then a third to make them explode. You can also explode TNT by tapping the plunger. Switches can be triggered by exploding them. Can you solve all the puzzles?

title: Find Sort Match
description: Find Sort Match is a fun and creative puzzle that combines sort and match elements. Let you experience the joy of DIY! In the game, sort and match items of various shapes, colors, and types. And complete each level of the challenge.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Find the Sprunki
description: Find out the hidden Sprunki in the specified images. Each level has 12 hidden Sprunki. There are 12 levels in total. The time is limited so be fast and find all hidden objects before time runs out. Clicking in the wrong place several times reduces the time by an additional 5 seconds. So, if you are ready, start the game and have fun!
instructions: Use mouse or touch on the screen!

title: Snake Puzzle 3D
description: Get ready to unravel a tangled knot of snakes to solve this puzzle! ?? Dive into the world of puzzle-solving games to become the legendary tangle master 3D! ?? Knock-knot! Who’s there? Riddle. Riddle who? Riddle me this: how do you unravel a twisted tangle of serpents? With your sharp puzzle-solving skills! ? Welcome to Snake Knot: Sort Puzzle Game where your logic and gaming skills will be tested! Sort serpents to unknot every twisted tangle and free every color snake!
instructions: Use mouse to move the snake

title: Sokoban P/R
description: Help the adorable loader handle his daily tasks in the classic Sokoban puzzle! Enjoy simple design, clever challenges, and the ability to develop your own strategy. Levels will gradually expand, so you can always test your skills. The best puzzle solutions await you!
instructions: Your goal is to move boxes to their designated spots, solving tasks that grow more challenging with each level.

title: 100 Doors Puzzle Box
description: The main goal in 100 Doors Puzzle Box is to escape the room. Using all the possibilities you need to open each of 100 doors and move the elevator to the next floor. Search for hidden objects, sovle puzzles and use an items to do this!
instructions: Use all your skills to complete all levels and get all achievements. Control for PC: Use the left and right mouse buttons, Mobile devices: touch input

title: 2048 Run Gorgeous Balls
description: 2048 Run: Gorgeous Balls is a fun arcade game that invites you to chase high scores in a delightful environment! In this creative 2048-style game, you’ll control a colorful array of balls as they race along a dynamic track.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Bubble Up
description: Help BUB, a tiny bubble, fulfill its dream of reaching the blazing sun. Use his bubble friends, BLE, to push BUB past obstacles, rise from the ground to towering buildings, and conquer the skies! You only need to shoot out BLE by click left mouse, good luck!
instructions: Left-click to shoot a new bubble. Use physics interactions to adjust the trajectory, ensuring at least one bubble can avoid obstacles and rise higher. Note: Bubbles attached to the original bubble will be given 'emotions.' The level is only completed when at least one bubble with 'emotions' successfully ascend.

title: Puzzle Blocks: Fill It Completely
description: Discover the world of exciting puzzles! In this game, you have to collect shapes by filling them with blocks of different sizes and configurations. Each task is a unique logical task that requires attention, patience and a strategic approach. Various difficulty levels - from easy for beginners to difficult for real masters. Original shapes and blocks - each level is unique.
instructions: Select a level. Each level offers a shape that needs to be filled. Move blocks of different shapes and sizes using the mouse or touch screen. Place the blocks inside the shape so that they fill it completely. If a block does not fit, move it to the side and try another one. Complete the level by filling the shape without gaps!

title: Traffic Jam Hop On
description: In Traffic Jam: Hop On, challenge your strategy thinking and quick reflexes! This wonderful puzzle game will take you into a colorful parking lot. Your task is to help all kinds of vehicles get out of traffic jams and start smoothly.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Bloom Sort 2: Bee Puzzle
description: Dive into the enchanting world of Bloom Sort 2: Bee Puzzle, where flowers bloom, bees buzz, and your mind gets a delightful workout! This unique 3D puzzle game combines stunning 2D and 3D graphics with a relaxing, chill vibe, making it the perfect escape for players of all ages.
instructions: Embark on an endless adventure of sorting, matching, and blooming flowers in a garden. Experience the joy of connecting colorful flowers and creating beautiful patterns while you unwind from the stresses of everyday life.

title: Code Maze
description: Master programming logic with Code Maze! Use code blocks to navigate mazes, overcome obstacles, and reach goals. Each level challenges your problem-solving skills. Ready to code your way out?
instructions: Drag code blocks to guide your avatar through the maze. Use moves, loops, and conditionals to reach the goal efficiently. Fewer blocks mean higher scores. Test, retry, and conquer each level!

title: Block Up
description: Block Up Contrast is a minimalist arcade game where you need a moving block upward through an endless series of obstacles. The challenge is to avoid barriers of contrasting colors while collecting points. The game requires precise timing and quick reflexes as the speed increases. With simple yet engaging gameplay, Block Up Contrast offers an addictive experience for players.
instructions: 1. Tap to move the block upward. 2. Avoid obstacles of contrasting colors. 3. Time your taps carefully to navigate through gaps. 4. Collect points to increase your score. 5. React quickly as the speed increases over time.

title: Pool 8
description: Pool 8 is a relaxing yet challenging billiards-style puzzle game where players must sink all the balls into the pockets in the correct order. The game follows a step-by-step movement system, requiring strategic planning to clear the table efficiently. With smooth mechanics and progressively difficult levels, Pool 8 offers a unique twist on classic pool gameplay, perfect for puzzle and strategy lovers.
instructions: 1. Swipe to move the cue ball in a straight line. 2. Plan your moves carefully—balls can only be pocketed in a specific order. 3. Use walls to change direction if necessary. 4. Clear the table by sinking all balls correctly. 5. Think ahead and strategize to complete each level efficiently!

title: Find It In The Haunted Mansion
description: “Find It In The Haunted Mansion” is a finding style game, where you are a detective and need to find all the keys hidden in each part of the house to complete all the levels.
instructions: On mobile, use screen touch On the computer, use the mouse.

title: Nuts Stack Sort: Nuts & Bolts
description: Challenging yet relaxing Nuts & Bolts sort puzzle with a unique twist! Nuts Stack Sort: Nuts & Bolts is a fun and addictive stack sort puzzle game with a unique twist! Strategically sort and match three same color nuts based on box color in this jam puzzles. Every level offers an exciting challenge in this addictive sort colors puzzle game. Test yourself with this amazing brain teaser!
instructions: Easy tap and match mechanic. Tap and sort nuts according to box color.

title: NG: Flow Lines
description: Flow Lines is an engaging and straightforward puzzle game where the main objective is to connect dots of the same color through a continuous path on a grid.
instructions: To play Flow Lines, tap on a colored dot and drag your finger across the screen to create a path connecting it to another dot of the same color. Ensure that the lines are continuous and do not overlap. The goal is to fill every square on the grid without

title: Limited Kaboom
description: Use your buddies to take down the enemy structures and the enemies along with them! Can you make survive the hero? Use the physics of the world to skillfully take down Sam's enemies!
instructions: Drag to Aim, Release to shoot

title: Unscrew Wood Puzzle
description: Unscrew Wood Puzzle: Screw Jam is an engaging puzzle game that combines logic, strategy, and dexterity in a tactile experience. Players are challenged to solve intricate puzzles involving bolts, nuts, and screws. With hundreds of unique levels, this game provides a blend of relaxation and mental stimulation, perfect for casual gamers and puzzle enthusiasts alike. The beautifully designed wooden and metallic elements create a visually appealing and satisfying gameplay experience.
instructions: - Objective: Unscrew bolts and unblock pieces to solve puzzles. - Controls: Tap, drag, and pinch to rotate screws, move pieces, and zoom in/out. - Gameplay: Unscrew in the correct sequence to clear obstacles and complete the level. - Tips: Plan your moves and focus on interlocking mechanisms to avoid getting stuck.-

title: Qube 2048
description: We present a unique arcade game that combines the dynamic gameplay of Q*bert and the mechanics of 2048! You start with the number 2 and move across a grid of blocks, doubling its value. The goal is to reach the maximum number by planning your moves and avoiding obstacles.
instructions: The goal of the game is to reach the highest possible number by moving across a grid of blocks, doubling numbers, and avoiding obstacles, which requires strategic planning and precise moves.

title: Number Domination
description: Number Domination is a turn-based strategy card game where players compete to claim tiles on the board using number cards (0-9). Create chains of three or more, match pairs, or make a "Perfect 9" by summing two cards to 9. Each successful move earns points and claims tiles. At the end, each occupied tile grants an extra point to its owner. Play in Face the Challenger or Face the Champion mode and win with smart moves. Think ahead, outplay your opponent, and dominate the numbers!
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to place number cards by tapping or dragging. Form pairs or chains to earn points and claim tiles. The player with the most points wins!

title: Triple Tile Twister Match Game
description: Triple Tile Twister: Match Game is a relaxing puzzle with a twist on mahjong. Clear the board by matching groups of three identical tiles. ?✨ Strategically select tiles to move to the holding area, which holds up to 7 tiles. Create sets of three to clear them, but watch out! ? If the area fills with unmatched tiles, the game ends. Enjoy soothing graphics and relaxing gameplay—perfect for unwinding! ? Great for both mahjong fans and newcomers! ?
instructions: Tap on tile to collect them, clear the board and win the level

title: Room Sort
description: Welcome to Room Sort - Floor Plan Game, the ultimate free puzzle game that combines the fun of tangram puzzles with the creativity of home design. In this engaging game, you’ll rearrange room blocks to complete floor plans. Each room connects through doors, so you'll need to place them perfectly to create a cohesive layout.
instructions: Swap the floor plan to correct positions

title: Jigsort Puzzles
description: Jigsort Puzzle is an app that is art puzzle and lets you complete jigsaw puzzle game for free! Various difficulty levels for casual and experiences puzzlers!
instructions: Swap the puzzle to correct position

title: Flag Puzzle Jam: Collect Flags
description: Immerse yourself in Flag Jam, a unique blend of puzzle-solving, flags collecting, and visual ASMR effects! Tap to match banner pieces, watch them glide smoothly into place, and clear the board as you complete each flag. With easy-to-learn mechanics and stunning visual effects, Flag Jam is the perfect game to help you unwind.
instructions: The navigation in this is very simple. Just use mouse on desktop or your finger tap on mobile devices.

title: Harvesting Veggies
description: Players will take on the role of a farmer, planting vegetables and achieving a full row or column to harvest. The game is based on a cartoon style, with a fresh and cute overall aesthetic, making it fun and addictive to play.
instructions: After starting the game, drag the fruit blocks to the empty spaces on the grid. Completing a row or column will eliminate the blocks. Each level ends when the top objectives are completed, unlocking the next level.

title: Bird Sort Challenges
description: Bird Sort Challenges is a fun and relaxing game where you sort colorful birds perched on branches, arranging them by matching colors. Test your problem-solving skills as you strategize to ensure no branch overflows and complete each puzzle efficiently. Whether you’re looking to unwind or sharpen your mind, Bird Sort: Color Sort Puzzle offers endless entertainment in a cheerful and visually pleasing world. Good luck!
instructions: Tap or mouse click to play!

title: Daily Wordler
description: Test your vocabulary and puzzle-solving skills with Daily Wordler, the ultimate word-guessing game that challenges your mind every day! With a simple yet addictive gameplay mechanic, Daily Wordler is perfect for fans of word games and brain teasers. Your goal is to guess the hidden word by entering valid words and using color-coded feedback to narrow down the solution. Yellow tiles indicate correct letters in the wrong position, while blue tiles signal correct letters in the right spot.
instructions: Guess the hidden word using clever logic and feedback clues in the addictive and challenging Daily Wordler game!

title: Train Master
description: All aboard for an exciting ride in Train Master! Tap and hold to control your train, race through stunning tracks, pick up passengers, and dodge obstacles. Navigate bustling cities and peaceful countryside as you master the tracks, upgrade your train, and become the ultimate conductor. Simple controls, thrilling challenges, and endless fun await. Start your adventure now!
instructions: Tap and hold to control your train, race through scenic tracks, and pick up passengers along the way. But watch out-Do not hit cars or people! Can you master the tracks and become the ultimate train conductor?

title: Find the Ghost Cat
description: Your mission is to track down elusive ghost cats! These sneaky felines are masters of camouflage, blending into their surroundings, fading into transparency, or hiding in shadows. Stay sharp and see if you can find them all!
instructions: Use your mouse or touch screen to click on the hidden cat. Be careful—each wrong click costs you one of your three lives! If you're stuck, use the hint button to reveal the cat's location.

title: Puzzle Blocks Asmr Match
description: Puzzle Blocks ASMR Match is a block puzzle game that combines classics with innovation. It is different from the block jigsaw games and brick puzzle games you usually play. This game uses a real physics engine. After the bottom blocks are eliminated, the upper bricks will automatically fall down, which makes the game more difficult. In the game, you cannot rotate the blocks to make them fit more gaps, which means that you often only have one chance.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Flip It 3D
description: In this fun and challenging puzzle platform game, test your strategic thinking as you navigate through levels where flipping platforms is the key to survival! Goblins and knights have different abilities, and they must be moved carefully across platforms to complete each level. But be careful—characters can only survive a limited number of flips, and platforms can't be flipped if they are occupied!
instructions: 1 - Flip Platforms: Press the flip button to turn platforms over 2- Goblins and Knights: Goblins can only survive a limited number of flips before they explode 3 - Platform Occupancy: If a platform is occupied by a character, you cannot flip it 4- Move Characters: Drag the characters to an empty platform to clear the way for flipping 5- Complete the Level: Flip all the platforms in the same direction to complete the level

title: Eco Block Puzzle
description: Unleash your creativity in a classic block puzzle game, then collect pets like in farming games! You are commanding the team of ecologists who are restoring the valley after an environmental catastrophe.
instructions: It's a classic block puzzle game with additional meta. Players should clean the environment after an ecological catastrophe. Expand cleaned land and purchase animals and lifeforms.

title: Hero Tower Wars Merge Puzzle
description: Join the exciting world of Hero Tower Wars - Merge Puzzle! Here is filled with tower defense strategy and merging games. Being careful of strategy and quick thinking are important. You'll play as a brave hero, battling enemies in layers of towers by mergers and digital strategies. Each tower has a different number of enemies. Use every number and a stronger sword to defeat enemies.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Sprunki Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Sprunki Jigsaw Puzzle is a fun jigsaw puzzle game. You can select one of the fifteen images and then select one of the four modes (16, 36, 64 and 100 pieces). Select your favorite picture and complete the jigsaw in the shortest time possible! Have fun and enjoy!
instructions: Use mouse or touch on the screen to solve the puzzle!
